verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Utterly abandonded To The Lord of all Seeking all His fullness Answering His dear call{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Utterly abandoned To The Holy Ghost Seeking all his fullness At whatever cost Cutting all the shore-lines Launching in the deep Of His mighty power Strong to save and keep{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Utterly abandoned to The Holy Ghost Oh the sinking sinking Till the self is lost Till the vessel's emptied Broken at his feet Waiting till His filling Makes the work complete{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Utterly abandoned to the will of God Walking in the pathway That my Master trod Leaving ease and pleasure Making Him my choice Waiting for His guidance Listening for His voice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Utterly abandoned Through eternity My will never choosing His it e'er shall be All my plans and longings Lost in His sweet will Having nothing Owning all things in Him still{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Utterly abandoned 'Tis so sweet to be Captive in His love-bonds Yet so wondrous free Free from sin's dominion Free from doubt and fear Free from every worry Burden grief or care{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Utterly abandoned Oh the rest is sweet Waiting in His presence At His blessed feet Waiting for the filling Of the Host divine Who my inward parts Shall perfectly refine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lo His Spirit fills me With His presence sweet I in Him am blessed I in Him complete Now the light within me Never shall grow dim While abandoned ever Living unto Him{/lang-eng}
